name: Barcelona Web Design
tagline: A CREATIVE AGENCY WITH A PASSION FOR DESIGN.
description:
Barcelona Web Design is a full digital service agency with 20+ years experience. They claim to guarantee results where others stop and excel at combining business strategies with the latest technologies.
Barcelona web design makes profitable websites, web applications and projects for entrepreneurs, business owners, Institutions, small and mid-sized companies. 
Their services include: web design (web shops, portfolio's, web presence, maintenance), content management systems (CMS),  Facebook apps (applications), MySpace, Linkedin, Google apps, seo (search engine optimization),  online marketing,  domain registration, webhosting and Google promotion.
